attributes.action: Jobcenters should have a job agencie department
attributes.additional_details:
All job centres should run a job agency department were local businesses can come to for short term staff. A person claiming benefits for over 6 weeks will be listed with this department and placed were ever possible with with a local business in line with there skill set. Placements will be free to the local business on a short term basis with only travel cost of the claimant to be refunded by the business and placement should be compulsory to A claimant in order to receive benefit.

I believe this would benefit local small businesses in the uk.

I believe this would benefit claimants by keeping a work patern in their lives and dispelling the something for nothing generation.

Thank you for your time. Michael Gittins
